boardgame.name: Asante
アサンテ
boardgame.description: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Asante_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, Swahili for _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;thank you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, is something an African merchant might say to you after he has made a good deal, and if you prove to be the better merchant in this game, you might wind up with an _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Asante_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; at game's end._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Asante is a two-player game set in the world of Jambo and Waka Waka with the same designer and artist as those games: R_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;uuml;diger Dorn and Michael Menzel. The players are dealers in an African marketplace, buying and selling furs, silk, jewelry, fruits, tea and salt in order to make the most money possible. During market day, they meet individuals with special abilities who can make deals not otherwise available; a player can also cause havoc for the opponent by loosing animals on his stand. If you visit one of the fifteen holy sites, you can take advantage of the special powers at those locations in addition to your normal five actions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Asante can be played together with Jambo or its expansions to create a marketplace with even more activity among its stalls!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: German edition by Kosmos - played just once. Shipping is: without shipping insurance: 4,50 EUR to Germany,9 EUR worldwide including shipping insurance: 7 EUR to Germany,13 EUR worldwide

The game: Kosmos (c) 2013. German edition! All game materials are in mint condition. Shipping: All shipping is done via DHL. Shipping costs depend on size and weight of the parcel and destination. Payment: Within EU I prefer the EU-standard-bank-tranfer (SEPA,IBAN/BIC). It is fast and causes no fees. Outside EU Paypal and bank-transfer are possible.

SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Payment is due within 2 days of the date you placed the order. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to follow through with the transaction. PAYMENT METHODS: PayPal SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping cost. All orders are shipping Priority Mail. RETURNS: All returns require authorization BEFORE returning the item. We will accept returns within 5 days of your receipt of the order. We only accept returns on items which are in their original condition. Original condition means, the game have not been played and all parts are in the same condition as they were when you received the game. We only refund shipping costs if the return is a result of our error. If you refuse delivery of an order, we will deduct the return shipping charge from your refund.

For Sale: Jambo/Asante/Jambo Expansions 1_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;2 I love this game. This game came out frequently in my old game group, but we moved several years ago. After moving I bought a copy of Jambo, the two Jambo expansions (1 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; 2) and Asante. Since we have played Jambo base game twice. In short my primary gaming partner, my wife, hates it. She doesnt like card combos and this game has alot of them. After holding on to it for 4 years hoping she would change her mind, I have come to realize that is not going to happen. Take this great collection. All cards and components are mint and complete, sleeved in premium sleeves. Only exception to this is that I do not have the Asante box. Cards were stored in Jambo box. Also important to point out that the two expansions are Dutch versions and I created English paste-ups (see images) that almost perfectly match the cards. Enjoy everything available for this wonderful game in a complete package! Shipping: $10 flat rate US/ actual rate to Canada.
